articles.description: Now that a star-crossed deal has closed, new plans are being rolled out to compete with the sector's king.
articles.content: One of the biggest stories in the EV world continues to be if Lordstown Motors  (RIDE) - Get Lordstown Motors Corp. Class A Report agreement to sell its Ohio manufacturing to Taiwan-based Foxconn  (F… [+3459 chars]
